judul: The Unrivaled Delinquent Combat King Is Actually A Healer In The Game World?
author: Dromo
synopsis: Original Web ComicI just want to be a healer priest, why should I be the strongest fighter?I just want to play a good game, why do I have to cross into the game? Build a priest character, but forced me to solve the problem with violence, can I do a good job as a priest?!
